error.appAction: Please verify your internet connection and try connecting again. If the issue keeps happening, grab your Game Boy.
error.appDescription: We could not load all the data we needed due to a technical issue.
error.emptyData: We could not load any data
quote.magikarp: Pokédex: A Magikarp living for many years can leap a mountain using Splash. The move remains useless, though.
quote.type: All the other types (Water, Electric, Grass, Fighting, Flying, Psychic and Dark) have been combined with every other type at least once as of the ninth generation!
template.typeDescription: The {name} type is one of the {total} types. There are at least {numberPokemons} pokémons of type {name} (counting those that are {name}-type in at least one of their forms).
